CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 13, 1957, pg. A14 reads: "Ellis Hotel Grand Opening - These scenes show part of the huge crowd that helped celebrate the grand opening of the Ellis Hotel on Centre Ave. last week...At the right is a picture of the crowd at the spacious horseshoe bar. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men and women gathered around horseshoe bar for grand opening of the Ellis Hotel
